name: @4awpawz/ghif
description: An issues formatter for Github's gh CLI issues

scripts.list-md: gh issue list -L 100000 -s closed --json 'number,title,labels,milestone' -R 4awpawz/fusion.ssg | ghif --report-list-md --colorized-labels --heading=CHANGELOG > tests/md/test-list.md
